pr_title: Only build part of application instance for host resource

timeline.message: Moved to more specific methods on ServiceMonitor
Add host indices to duper model
Only build part of application instance for host resource
Log and forward duper model completion

timeline.bodyText: Most of the time oldHostnames and hostnames will be equal, maybe consider adding optimization to skip all that removal and addition if that is the case?
timeline.author: freva

replies.author: hakonhall
freva

replies.bodyText: I now have a version I think is just as effective in the no-change case, but also performs well in the other cases. I have also added a log warning on duplicate host allocation.
replies.author: hakonhall

timeline.author: freva

timeline.message: More effective duper model update on activation
